author: cdouglas
msg: HADOOP-3442. Limit recursion depth in QuickSort to avoid StackOverflowErrors.

author: dreiss
msg: Fix thrift_server to create transport and protocol inside the processor rather than inside the acceptor.
This fixes a process and file descriptor leak -- previously, the thrift_buffered_transport process was linked to the acceptor, which never died.

author: dreiss
msg: Fix error logging to actually print error and stack trace for caught errors

author: dreiss
msg: Handle crashes/errors in the processor by sending back a serialized exception

author: cdouglas
msg: HADOOP-3442. Limit recursion depth on the stack for QuickSort to prevent
StackOverflowErrors. To avoid O(n*n) cases, when partitioning depth exceeds a
multiple of log(n), change to HeapSort.
